name: Chicken Parmesan Grilled Cheese
description: Chicken breasts breaded/fried, smothered with tomato sauce and covered with mozzarella - all neatly in a cheesy sandwich!!
recipeIngredient: 2  boneless skinless chicken breasts (cut crosswise in half)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a waffle iron to medium-high heat. Lightly oil the top and bottom of the waffle iron or coat with nonstick spray.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat a waffle iron to medium-high heat. Lightly oil the top and bottom of the waffle iron or coat with nonstick spray.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium high heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium high heat.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine breadcrumbs and Parmesan; set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine breadcrumbs and Parmesan; set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Working one at a time, dredge chicken in flour, dip into eggs, then dredge in breadcrumbs mixture, pressing to coat.
recipeInstructions.name: Working one at a time, dredge chicken in flour, dip into eggs, then dredge in breadcrumbs mixture, pressing to coat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add chicken to the skillet and cook until evenly golden and crispy, about 3-4 minutes. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate.
recipeInstructions.name: Add chicken to the skillet and cook until evenly golden and crispy, about 3-4 minutes. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate.

recipeInstructions.text: Working in batches, place bread slices into the waffle iron. Top with chicken, tomato sauce, mozzarella and remaining bread slices. Close gently and cook until golden brown and crisp, about 3-4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Working in batches, place bread slices into the waffle iron. Top with chicken, tomato sauce, mozzarella and remaining bread slices. Close gently and cook until golden brown and crisp, about 3-4 minutes.

review.reviewBody: Do you think your waffle sandwiches would grill on a George Foreman grill as well as a waffle iron?
